verses.text: God, \w who|strong="G2316"\w* at sundry \w times|strong="G4181"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in divers \w manners|strong="G4187"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* in time \w past|strong="G3819"\w* unto the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*,

\w Hath|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \add his\add* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w* \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w made|strong="G4160"\w* the \w worlds|strong="G0165"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* the \w brightness|strong="G0541"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \add his\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the express \w image|strong="G5481"\w* \w of|strong="G5287"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w person|strong="G5287"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w upholding|strong="G5342"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* by the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, when he \w had|strong="G4160"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w purged|strong="G2512"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of the \w Majesty|strong="G3172"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w*;

Being \w made|strong="G1096"\w* so \w much|strong="G5118"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* than the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w as|strong="G3745"\w* he hath by inheritance \w obtained|strong="G2816"\w* a more \w excellent|strong="G1313"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* unto \w which|strong="G5101"\w* of the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* said \w he|strong="G2036"\w* at any \w time|strong="G4218"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w have|strong="G1080"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* he bringeth \w in|strong="G1521"\w* the \w firstbegotten|strong="G4416"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G4352"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4314"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ministers|strong="G3011"\w* a \w flame|strong="G5395"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \add he saith\add*, \w Thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, O \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add is\add* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*: a \w sceptre|strong="G4464"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G2118"\w* \add is\add* the \w sceptre|strong="G4464"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w*.

Thou hast \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hated|strong="G3404"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0458"\w*; \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add even\add* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, hath \w anointed|strong="G5548"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* with the \w oil|strong="G1637"\w* of \w gladness|strong="G0020"\w* \w above|strong="G3844"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w fellows|strong="G3353"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* hast laid the \w foundation|strong="G2311"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G5495"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*:

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w remainest|strong="G1265"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w all|strong="G3956"\w* shall wax \w old|strong="G3822"\w* as \w doth|strong="G5613"\w* a \w garment|strong="G2440"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* a \w vesture|strong="G4018"\w* shalt thou \w fold|strong="G1667"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1667"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they shall be \w changed|strong="G0236"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w shall|strong="G1587"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fail|strong="G1587"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* of the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* said \w he|strong="G2046"\w* at any \w time|strong="G4218"\w*, \w Sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* I \w make|strong="G5087"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w footstool|strong="G5286"\w*?

Are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w ministering|strong="G3010"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, sent \w forth|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w minister|strong="G1248"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* them \w who|strong="G3588"\w* shall \w be|strong="G3195"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2816"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*?
